message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your item, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $165? That's a very fair price for this quality.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I still believe I can find the product elsewhere for less. I would like to propose a price of $140 for the product.
